channel.title: Item help
channel.description: I just added customs to my rsps, and the only problem is, they are partyhats, and they are being equiped into the weapon slot and not the hat slot. Little help?

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

thanks guys i fixed it

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @Mikey96 Mikey96
item.description:
@Mikey96 wrote:

Ok, I’m assuming this is for PI.

Look in a file called ItemAssistant.java.

Search for:

Scroll down a little & under:

Then add your case for example:

case 1038: //partyhat
     return 0;

It is returned as 0.
0 is the slot for your head equipment.

Here is a list of all the targetSlots:

if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("cape")) { targetSlot = 1; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("hat")) { targetSlot = 0; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("amulet")) { targetSlot = 2; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("arrows")) { targetSlot = 13; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("body")) { targetSlot = 4; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("shield")) { targetSlot = 5; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("legs")) { targetSlot = 7; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("gloves")) { targetSlot = 9; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("boots")) { targetSlot = 10; } else if (itemType(wearID).equalsIgnoreCase("ring")) { targetSlot = 12; } else { targetSlot = 3;

EMMMMMMM OR AS SAID ABOVE SMH:

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/301201-pi-fixing-incorrect-item-slots.html

LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Item help
item.dc:creator: @grandstinger grandstinger
item.description:
@grandstinger wrote:

beale:

I just added customs to my rsps, and the only problem is, they are partyhats, and they are being equiped into the weapon slot and not the hat slot. Little help?

If it’s 667 then look in Equipment.java and you’ll see what you need to do. if not 667 then idk
